topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555e89b263687220a4da0b00#post_555e89b263687220a4da0b00

I want to say that sixth graders are sixth graders, I was loud without a care in the world like them at that stage. Still, I wouldn't have stooped as low as the make fun of someone's involuntary tic. 

And it's not even really the parent's fault. I am almost positive that those kids go home, get good grades, are polite, and do their parents proud. And making fun of something like that is something they'd never do around those same proud parents. It's a byproduct of groupthink, or some other psychological shit.
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

So apparently there's a thing called christ-chan.


You know, as much as I like moe girls, considering that the internet has created moe girls of everything from ISIS-chan to Ebola-chan to Grieve-tan to Rachael Purity, etc, etc I have to say something: the internet is really skilled at turning *anything* into moe girls.
